title: Bloomberg's Wilson on Winners, Losers, Stock of the Day (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Wilson on Winners, Losers, Stock of the Day (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Bloomberg stocks editor David Wilson on today's market winners, losers, and Stock of the Day: Horizon Global (HZN).
